page.title: User Management
page.description: Create and manage your organization's user accounts
page.access_denied_message: You do not have the necessary permissions to view users.

actions.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
actions.confirm_deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this user?
actions.confirm_activate: Are you sure you want to activate this user?

messages.cannot_modify_own_role: You cannot modify your own role

empty.title: No users found
empty.no_results: No users match your search criteria

bulk.deactivate_message:
Deactivate {{count}} user(s)?

They will be moved to deleted items.

modal.deactivate_confirm: Are you sure you want to deactivate user {{name}}?
modal.deactivate_warning_1: The user will no longer be able to log in
modal.deactivate_warning_3: You can reactivate them later if needed
modal.restore_confirm: Are you sure you want to restore {{name}}? This user will become active again and will be able to access the platform.
modal.permanent_delete_warning: This action will permanently delete all data for this user. This operation cannot be undone.
modal.permanent_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{name}}?
modal.create_subtitle: Add a new user with a generated password
modal.create_enhanced_subtitle: Add a new user to the platform
modal.default_role_description: Default role for testing - Access to basic features
modal.secure_creation_description: A temporary password will be generated and sent by email. The user will need to change it on first login.
modal.create_error_default: An error occurred while creating the user
modal.create_error_email_exists: This email is already used by another user in the organization.
modal.create_error_email_exists_short: This email is already used by another user.
modal.create_error_insufficient_permissions: Insufficient permissions to create a user.
modal.toast_org_and_user_created_detail: Organization "{{orgName}}" and the user have been created successfully.
modal.org_existing_message: An organization with the name "{{name}}" already exists. Please choose a different name or select the existing organization.
modal.auto_created_in_org: The user will be automatically created in your organization
modal.auto_info_slug: Slug will be generated automatically (e.g., acme-corporation)
modal.auto_info_timezone: Timezone will be set to Europe/Paris
modal.auto_info_assignment: The user will be automatically assigned to this organization

credentials.subtitle_org_and_user: Organization "{{orgName}}" and user {{firstName}} {{lastName}} have been created successfully
credentials.org_auto_assigned: The user has been automatically assigned to this organization
credentials.must_change_password: The user must change this password on first login
credentials.temporary_credentials: These credentials are temporary and secure
